channel.title: Problem with ancient magic spells
channel.description:
The multi spells hit anyone regardless of their level in the wilderness. For example, If I'm lvl 126 and I barrage a lvl 125 in 5 wild and there is a lvl 20 standing near us, the lvl 20 will also be hit. If I try to attack the lvl 20 directly, it will not work.
I do not want anyone outside of the lvl range being hit by magic. Any idea how to solve this?
